plugins.name: UniBold: Unicode Page Styler
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma workspace with sophisticated typography that stands out. UniBold converts standard text into elegant mathematical sans-serif bold characters, creating visual hierarchy and professional organization throughout your design files.


Why designers love UniBold:

  1. Create instant visual distinction between sections and components
  2. Maintain consistent typographic hierarchy across all projects
  3. Improve team navigation with clearly emphasized page names
  4. Enhance presentation-ready files with polished page organization


Getting started is simple:

  1. Select the page you want to restyle
  2. Choose the style that works best for you: Uppercase, Lowercase, or preserve your original formatting
  3. Apply the new bold Unicode style to your page name with a single click


Elevate your file organization from functional to exceptional. UniBold transforms the mundane task of page naming into an opportunity for refined design thinking‚Äîbecause even the smallest details deserve attention.

accepted.name: Petr "Stoky" Novak
accepted.description: My passions are product design, UI, and design systems...all at Emplifi

plugins.name: Gene UI Tokens Hub
plugins.description:
Gene UI Tokens Hub

Streamline your design-to-development workflow with Gene UI Tokens Hub, a Figma plugin that connects your design system tokens to your GitHub repository.


Key Features

  1. Sync Figma variables and explore them using JSON tree and variable collections filters
  2. Connect to GitHub and push changes to your style dictionary package
  3. Generate CSS3 and JavaScript variables from your design tokens


Benefits

  1. Automate the process of converting tokens into code
  2. Ensure consistency across your design system, design, and development teams
  3. Save time and reduce errors during the sync process of tokens


How it Works

  1. Install the Gene UI Tokens Hub plugin in your Figma account
  2. Make changes in Figma built-in variables and use it in your design styles
  3. Open the Gene UI Tokens Hub, and connect your GitHub repository to the plugin
  4. Review your changes and push them to your GitHub repository, where your style dictionary package will be generated
plugins.tagline: The Gene UI design system tokens hub plugin to keep aligned tokens between design and development

plugins.name: Winding Rule Inspector
plugins.description:
Warning: If you don't know what Winding Rules are, you probably don't need this plugin.


If you want to know more about winding rules, follow this link: https://oreillymedia.github.io/Using_SVG/extras/ch06-fill-rule.html


This plugin allows designers to quickly inspect the winding rule of vector objects in Figma. It provides instant feedback about the selected vector's winding rule, helping you understand and manage the rendering behavior of complex vector shapes.


Key features:

- Automatically displays the winding rule of the selected vector object

- Updates in real-time as you select different vector objects

- Provides clear notifications for non-vector selections or when no object is selected

- Runs unobtrusively in the background, allowing you to continue your design work


How to use:

1. Run the plugin

2. Select any vector object in your Figma design

3. A notification will appear showing the winding rule of the selected vector

4. As you select different vector objects, the notification will update automatically


This tool is perfect for designers working with complex vector illustrations, icons, or any projects where precise control over vector rendering is crucial. Understanding the winding rule can help resolve unexpected rendering issues and ensure your vectors display correctly across different platforms and use cases.


Note: This plugin only works with vector objects. Selecting any other type of object will result in a notification indicating that the selected object is not a vector.

accepted.name: Thierry
accepted.description: I am Thierry ‚Äì a designer, developer, and, typographer based New York. I‚Äôve worked with companies large and small, building and maintaining design systems.

plugins.tagline: This plugin allows designers to quickly inspect the winding rule of vector objects in Figma.

plugins.name: GIFtastic
plugins.description:
üé¨ GIFtastic - Turn Your Figma Frames Into Animated GIFs

Transform your Figma designs into captivating animated GIFs with just a few clicks! Perfect for showcasing UI interactions, creating marketing assets, or sharing design concepts.


‚ú® Key Features

  1. Smart & Simple
  2. Select frames and preview your animation in real-time
  3. Drag & drop to reorder frames
  4. One-click export with automatic downloads


Professional Quality

  1. 4 quality levels (64-256 colours)
  2. Multiple background options (transparent, white, black, or frame fill)
  3. Advanced dithering for smooth gradients
  4. Real-time file size preview


Complete Control

  1. Adjustable frame timing (0.05-5 seconds)
  2. Loop settings and playback controls
  3. Live preview with play/pause
  4. Memory-efficient processing


üöÄ Perfect For

  1. UI/UX Designers: Showcase app interactions and user flows
  2. Marketing Teams: Create engaging social media content
  3. Product Teams: Demonstrate features and functionality
  4. Anyone: Who wants to make their designs move!


üéØ How It Works

  1. Select your frames in Figma
  2. Preview your animation with real-time playback
  3. Adjust quality, timing, and background settings
  4. Reorder frames by dragging if needed
  5. Export and download your GIF instantly


Ready to bring your designs to life? Install GIFtastic and start creating engaging animated stories from your Figma frames!
plugins.tagline: Transform your Figma designs into captivating animated GIFs with just a few clicks!

plugins.name: Oz Words
plugins.description:
Introducing Oz Words, the powerful content design plugin for Figma that streamlines your workflow and simplifies your development process.


How to use


  1. Rename the layer's name of your text by starting with "#t." and then follow with words. For example, "#t.back" or "#t.page_a.title"
  2. Open Oz Words Plugin, go to the library of the language you want to edit
  3. Look for the word you want to edit in code, edit and click save
  4. After saving, your text will update automatically


Note

This is our Beta version to test our concept. Please follow us for more updates. We are working on a simpler and user-friendly version and hope it will come out soon. Cheers!
plugins.tagline: With Oz Words, you can create text as components that can be edited and updated with just one click.

plugins.name: Dynamo
plugins.description:
Effortlessly increase design quality and accessibility


  1. Live preview Dynamic Type in real time
  2. Spot where text needs to wrap or truncate
  3. Add your scaled designs to the canvas with a click
  4. Saves you a ton of time


What's Dynamic Type?


Many users set a text size other than the default in order to read content more comfortably. Supporting Dynamic Type and larger text sizes is an important accessibility requirement. Dynamo scales text layers in your designs to test how they handle larger text sizes. Making it much easier to increase the quality, robustness, and inclusivity of your designs.


For best results


  1. Use auto layout in your designs so that layouts remain in tact once text layers have scaled
  2. To ignore a text layer, prepend its name with a period


Please leave comments and feedback below.

accepted.description:

125441.description:
Effortlessly increase design quality and accessibility


  1. Live preview Dynamic Type in real time
  2. Spot where text needs to wrap or truncate
  3. Add your scaled designs to the canvas with a click
  4. Saves you a ton of time


What's Dynamic Type?


Many users set a text size other than the default in order to read content more comfortably. Supporting Dynamic Type and larger text sizes is an important accessibility requirement. Dynamo scales text layers in your designs to test how they handle larger text sizes. Making it much easier to increase the quality, robustness, and inclusivity of your designs.


For best results


  1. Use auto layout in your designs so that layouts remain in tact once text layers have scaled
  2. To ignore a text layer, prepend its name with a period


Please leave comments and feedback below.

plugins.name: Figma to Celtra
plugins.description:
Transform your design workflow with the "Figma to Celtra" integration! Effortlessly import your stunning Figma designs into Celtra's design workspace and unlock the power of creative automation.


Key Features:

  1. Streamlined Workflow: Continue your pre-production processes and create conceptual designs in Figma, then drop them into Celtra with ease for a cohesive and efficient design experience.
  2. Efficient Importing: Easily transition your designs from Figma to Celtra using a simple copy and paste function. Whether you're working with single layers or multiple artboards, the process is quick and hassle-free.
  3. Layer Mapping: Experience seamless compatibility as all layer types from Figma are mapped to their corresponding layers in Celtra. Make configurations effortlessly for Images, Text, Shapes, and Groups right after you import.


Once your designs are in Celtra, take advantage of creative automation to scale your content across various sizes and design variations without missing a beat. Upgrade your design collaboration and scaling capabilities today by using "Figma to Celtra", and take the first step toward a more streamlined creative workflow.


Note that this plugin is compatible only with design files created in Celtra's Creative Automation platform.
plugins.tagline: Seamless Design Integration

plugins.name: Companion
plugins.description:
Advanced Color Finder [PRO Feature]

A powerful tool that allows you to search for colors across your files.

  1. Ultra-fast search algorithm with advanced labeling
  2. Colors are grouped by type (variable or style) and by source (Remote or local libraries)
  3. Ability to search by variable name, color hex and by layer name
  4. Display number of matching results per color
  5. Select all or individual layers that matches the selected color


Style Guide Generator [Free]

  1. Transform your color collections into a beautiful style guide
  2. Choose one or more color formats to display (HEX, RGB, HSL)
  3. Support for cross-collections linked variables


Contrast Checker [Free]

  1. Check for AA and AAA level compliance
  2. Interactive and instant results when adjusting colors
  3. Live preview and swap foreground and background colors
  4. Get results for for text (Small / Large) and graphics elements


Tints & Shades Generator [Free]

  1. Interactive generator with live colors preview
  2. Ability to customize the number of generated colors
  3. Built-in contrast checker
  4. Preview generated colors on canvas
  5. Save generated colors to variables


Color Converter [Free]

  1. Convert any given color to popular color formats
  2. Currently supports HEX, RGB, HSL, CMYK, HSV, OKLCH and LAB
  3. Select and copy results


‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï


Sort Layers [Free]

A set of different ways to sort your layers within Figma.

  1. Alphabetical sorting (A-Z or Z-A)
  2. Sort by X or Y position on the canvas
  3. Sort by layer type (Frame, text, group, section, etc‚Ä¶)
  4. Reverse current sorting
  5. Magically sort everything based on names and positions


Distribute Layers [Free]

A powered up version of Figma‚Äôs built-in distribute feature.

  1. Distribute selected layers horizontally or vertically
  2. Set a desired value for the space between layers
  3. Ability to align layers from top (in horizontal mode) or left (in vertical mode)


Display As Grid [Free]

Quickly rearrange selected layers in a grid layout with improved alignment and sorting features

  1. Ability to choose the number of columns along with vertical and horizontal gaps
  2. Ability to align columns vertically or not
  3. Extra sorting capabilities for better organization


Hidden Layers [PRO Feature]

Simple yet powerful tool to bulk manage hidden layers. It allows you to

  1. Hide selected layers
  2. Show all hidden layers within a page or within a selection
  3. Select all hidden layers within a page or within a selection
  4. Delete all hidden layers within a page or within a selection


Locked Layers [Free]

Simple yet powerful tool to bulk manage locked layers. It allows you to

  1. Lock or unlock selected layers
  2. Lock or unlock all layers on a page


Remove Numbers [PRO Feature]

Get rid of all those annoying numbers that Figma automatically generates. A single click gets the job done


Ungroup Single Layers Group [PRO Feature]

Optimize your files by ungrouping single layers group or deleting empty groups


Start at 0, 0 [PRO Feature]

It‚Äôs just the cherry on top. A file is never tidy unless you start at 0, 0 ‚Äî and for that, we got you covered


‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï


Fix Detached Instances [PRO Feature]

Preview and fix all detached instances within your files.

  1. Find all detached instances across pages
  2. Preview of the original component versus the detached instance
  3. Link instance to original component
  4. Maintain all manual overrides


‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï


Deep Search [PRO Feature]

Deep Search is a unique and ultra-fast way to find any layer within your file, in a simple yet powerful search tool. The search algorithm has been thoroughly optimized for speed, especially for large files.


Below is how it works:

  1. Start by selecting the layer type (Frame, text, rectangle, etc.) or choose ‚ÄúAll Layers‚Äù to search everything
  2. Choose one or more properties to search for (Fill color, width, font, opacity and many many more). You can also use the Quick Search box to search for any property from the list for easier access
  3. Hit the search button and voil√†. Results are there.
  4. Browse the list of matching search results, with ability to filter by layer name.
  5. Click on a result to view it on the canvas or click ‚ÄúSelect All‚Äù to bulk select all matching results


Here are some example scenarios:

  1. [Simple] ‚Äï Find all text layers with the font ‚ÄúInter‚Äù and font weight ‚ÄúSemi Bold‚Äù
  2. [Simple] ‚Äï Find all rectangles with a corner radius of 16 and corner smoothing of 60%
  3. [Medium] ‚Äï Find all instances of a component named ‚ÄúButton‚Äù that are hidden and have been detached
  4. [Medium] ‚Äï Find all auto layouts that have a minimum width of at least 393px
  5. [Advanced] ‚Äï Find all instances of an external library component named ‚ÄúInput‚Äù that are marked as ready for dev and whose top left corner radius is less than or equal to 20px
  6. [Advanced] ‚Äï Find all layers that have a hidden stroke, have a blend mode applied and whose name include the characters ‚Äúes‚Äù


In short, the possibilities are endless


‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï


MagiConnect [PRO Feature]

MagiConnect is a simple and easy to use tool that allows you to draw connectors between your frames


Here are some key features:

  1. Auto-draw mode: When enabled, it allows you to quickly draw connectors between any two elements you select on the canvas. The direction of the connector arrow is based on the selection order
  2. Manual mode was designed to give you more flexibility in accessing nested layers before drawing a connector. It‚Äôs slower for sure, but gives you more control
  3. You can customize the connector by adjusting the color, opacity, stroke width, radius and stroke style
  4. If you‚Äôre not happy with the connector customizations, you can always reset all values to their default state from the manage menu
  5. You can also add an optional description to annotate the connector
  6. The tool will always remember your last used settings whenever it‚Äôs launched the next time.
  7. You can update specific connectors within a selection or update globally across a page
  8. In cases where a fresh start is the way to go, simple go to ‚ÄúManage‚Äù and select ‚ÄúRemove all connectors‚Äù. This will delete all connectors you‚Äôve added on this page


‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï‚Äï


When you purchase the license, you will get a lifetime unlimited access to the plugin, and all to the upcoming features that i‚Äôm planning to add. Some really exciting features are coming soon. This is truly the beginning.


Due to limitations from Figma, you can only access PRO features from the account you purchased the license on. You will not be able to access PRO features from connected accounts and must purchase the license again if you want to use it on another account.


Future releases of the plugin might not be at the current price tag.


If you made it this far, I salute you for your patience.


For any questions, ideas, bugs or complaints, I would love to hear from you. Please feel free to reach out.


Built with ‚ù§Ô∏è

plugins.name: Quick Rename
plugins.description:
Automatically renames frames and components in Figma based on their auto-layout properties. It helps designers maintain consistent and meaningful layer naming conventions, making it easier to understand the structure and purpose of elements in complex designs.


Key features


  1. Renames frames with auto-layout to "Column", "Row", or "Wrap" based on their layout mode
  2. Labels frames without auto-layout as "Container"
  3. Identifies frames containing text as "Content"
  4. Rename all shapes as "Vector"
  5. Preserves naming for component instances
  6. Reset text layers names


Benefits


  1. Saves time on manual renaming
  2. Improves file organization and readability
  3. Enhances collaboration by providing clear visual hierarchy
  4. Helps maintain consistency across design systems
  5. Makes it easier to identify and update layout structures
plugins.tagline: Essential keyboard shortcut to rename layers

This plugin is designed to manage and modify the sizing constraints of selected elements within auto layout frames or elements that are themselves auto layout frames.


Functionality:

  1. Setting min/max width or height
  2. Setting both min and max width or height simultaneously
  3. Setting all dimensions (min/max width and height)
  4. Removing min/max width or height constraints
  5. Removing all constraints

plugins.name: Athlon TOC
plugins.description:
Navigate Your Figma Projects Like Never Before


A tool to streamline your design workflow. This powerful plugin automatically generates a detailed table of contents for your Figma files, making navigation through complex projects a breeze.


Features and Benefits:


Automatic Detection: The tool scans your Figma file and automatically identifies all sections and frames, organizing them into a clear, concise table of contents.


Clickable Links: Each entry in the table of contents is a clickable link, allowing you to jump directly to the relevant section or frame. No more scrolling through endless layers to find what you need!


Dynamic Updates: As your project evolves, rerunning the tool dynamically updates the table of contents to reflect changes, ensuring that you always have an up-to-date overview.


Vertical Auto-Layout: The table of contents is presented in a neatly organized vertical auto-layout frame, providing a clear and structured overview of your document.


Customizable Layout: While the tool takes care of the heavy lifting, you retain full control over the layout and presentation of your table of contents, ensuring it complements your design process.


Easy to Use:

Simply install the plugin, run it within your Figma file, and watch as it transforms your workflow, saving you time and effort.
plugins.tagline: Navigate with Ease: Instant Table of Contents for Your Figma Files

plugins.name: E-ImageCompression
plugins.description:
E-ImageCompression is a privacy-focused tool that lets you reduce image sizes by up to 90% without sacrificing quality, seamlessly integrated into your workflow.


Your files are never stored on our servers ‚Äî images are processed securely via the official TinyPNG API and delivered straight back to you.


Batch compress multiple images, preview results, and export everything with a single click.

Perfect for anyone who values speed, security, and high-quality image optimization.
plugins.tagline: Optimize images in one click

137621.name: E-ImageCompression
137621.description:
E-ImageCompression is a privacy-focused tool that lets you reduce image sizes by up to 90% without sacrificing quality, seamlessly integrated into your workflow.


Your files are never stored on our servers ‚Äî images are processed securely via the official TinyPNG API and delivered straight back to you.


Batch compress multiple images, preview results, and export everything with a single click.

Perfect for anyone who values speed, security, and high-quality image optimization.

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin uses TinyPNG API for image compression. Since TinyPNG API doesn't support CORS directly, we use a CORS proxy (cors.siteceterum.ru) for secure API communication.

plugins.name: Work/Space
plugins.description:
Work/Space is a Figma plugin designed to streamline the setup of your Figma page structure with just a button click. It also includes a built-in traffic light management feature for page organisation, as demonstrated in the GIF.


Having been a developer in my past life, I can empathise with their challenges. Uncertainty about what to expect, especially when they use Figma for the first time, can delay project delivery. The inspiration for this plugin came from numerous discussions with various development teams. I realised that:


1. Developers generally don't understand Atomic Design Systems.


2. The 'Ready for dev' feature in Figma, while beneficial, isn't the most efficient way to visually communicate readiness to developers.


3. Crucially, not all development teams have access to the infamous 'Dev Mode' (a questionable decision, Figma), particularly smaller agencies or teams with limited budgets.


The traffic light system is an effective project management tool. The page management feature in Work/Space subtly encourages conversations with developers to minimise communication gaps effectively.


To make the best use of the plugin, you can set your own page structure using the source code. Contact me for more details :)


For any issues, suggestions or feedback, please reach out to me on my email hi@sai.design.

accepted.name: Sai Maniganahalli
accepted.description: I'm a multi-disciplinary designer based in Australia :)

plugins.tagline: Minimise your project setup time using Work/Space
